name: Crappy Mobile Game
description:
Just a rush pool game. Try to push the ball on the same color holes as hard as you can!

Hurry Up! The timer is running and you have less than a min to finish. To make it cooler, you slow time every time for a short period you want to shot.

NOTE: Idk if i will continue the project. I tough in adding editable colors, more elements on screen, etc... But i need some support to continue cause i feel so desmotivated. I found it fun but not enough enjoyable or scalable.
